title: dist: windows installer should ask for admin privileges
body:
https://golang.org/issue/3214?c=10

"I installed go.weekly.2012-03-04.windows-386 on Win7. I encountered the following
error dialog:

The installer has insufficient privileges to access this directory: D:\Go\test. The
installation cannot continue. Log on as administrator or contact your system
administrator."

This should do whatever is usual in Windows land. I would expect a dialogue to pop up
asking for the relevant privileges. An alternative is to offer to install to another
location.
